directions: Bring 5 1/2 cups water with salt to a boil in a 2-quart saucepan. Add carrot, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, until tender, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.
Whisk together shiro miso and remaining 1/2 cup water in a small bowl until smooth, then whisk into carrot mixture. Add tofu and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/3 cup shiro miso (white fermented soybean paste)
1/2 cup 1/4-inch dice of silken tofu (3 oz)
title: Miso Soup with Carrots and Tofu
